channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from 123, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Shares of Cartier owner Richemont jump 16% as sales rise in December quarter
item.description: Cartier owner Richemont on Thursday reported a 10% increase in third quarter sales even as China demand weighed.

item.title: Bitcoin Hits Record, Dollar Slides Ahead of Trump's Swearing In
item.description: The new peak above $109,000 was reached Monday, and stock futures edged higher. Since Trump was elected, bitcoin has surged more than 50%.

item.title: Gold Futures Broadly Flat Ahead of Trump's Inauguration
item.description: Gold futures were broadly flat as the dollar softened, with investors seeking clarity on potential Trump policies that could affect inflation trends, ...

item.title: TSMC net profit hits record high as fourth-quarter results top expectations on robust AI chip demand
item.description: TSMC, the world's largest contract chip manufacturer, produces advanced processors for clients such as Nvidia and Apple and has benefited from the meg...

item.title: Oil Slide Accelerates After WSJ Reports Trump Won't Impose Immediate Tariffs
item.description: Oil’s declines accelerated after the WSJ reported that Trump isn’t planning to impose new tariffs on his first day in office.

item.title: Dollar's Drop Shows Sensitivity to Tariff News
item.description: The dollar’s sudden drop on a WSJ report that Trump is unlikely to implement immediate tariffs shows just how sensitive the currency is to tariff news...

item.title: Bank of America tops estimates on better-than-expected investment banking, interest income
item.description: The company said fourth-quarter profit more than doubled to $6.67 billion, or 82 cents per share, from a year earlier.

item.title: Here's what it will take for Apple to get out of its 2025 funk
item.description: Evercore ISI said China may be a "key wildcard" for Apple during the company's upcoming fiscal Q1 release on Jan. 30.

item.title: Morgan Stanley tops estimates on strong equities and fixed income trading revenue

item.title: Gilt Yield Rise Ahead of Tuesday's U.K. Labor Market Data
